about_monica.subtitle: ‚≠ê Certified Coach, Author, and Speaker
about_monica.bio_paragraph1: I'm Monica Leggett, a seasoned expert with years of experience dedicated to transforming lives and accelerating goal achievement. With proven methods, endless energy, and infectious enthusiasm, my passion lies in helping individuals navigate both career and personal journeys, whether you're climbing the corporate ladder or seeking to enhance your personal and professional journey.
about_monica.bio_paragraph2: My approach isn't just about reaching goals; it's about the journey, the growth, and the insights you gain along the way. Together, we'll unlock your potential and create a life filled with purpose and fulfillment.

services_section.book_description: Start your transformation journey with my book. Eight proven steps to overcome doubt and take decisive action in your life.

hero_carousel.book_subtitle: Eight Steps to Get Unstuck and Take Action
hero_carousel.book_description: Transform your life with proven strategies for overcoming doubt and making decisive choices.
hero_carousel.coaching_description: Personalized coaching sessions to unlock your potential and achieve your goals.
hero_carousel.mentor_description: ICF-certified training and support for coaches looking to elevate their practice.
hero_carousel.mastermind_description: Join a supportive community of like-minded individuals accelerating their growth.

about_homepage.description1: I'm Monica Leggett, a seasoned expert with years of experience dedicated to transforming lives and accelerating goal achievement.
about_homepage.description2: My approach isn't just about reaching goals; it's about the journey, the growth, and the insights you gain along the way.

services_homepage.book_description: Start your transformation journey with my book. Eight proven steps to overcome doubt and take decisive action in your life.
services_homepage.coaching_description: One-on-one coaching tailored to your unique challenges. Get personalized guidance to unlock your full potential.

lead_magnet.title: Ready to Take Action?
lead_magnet.description: Download your free Action Guide and start your transformation journey today. Eight practical exercises to help you move from doubtful to decisive.
